title: Gifting doesnt work
body:
Im trying to Mystery gift a skin to a friend of mine and  this comes up You are unable to send this gift for one of the following reasons:
"ERROR_CREATING_FFG_ACCOUNT_NICKNAME" {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}} is there something wrong with my client? or is the gifting not working right at the moment???

replies.body:
Hey derpyharpy,

This usually indicates the player you're trying to gift hasn't been on your friends list long enough. They must be on your list for at least 24 hours before you can gift them, as a mitigating measure for hacked accounts. Let me know if that's the case. You can find more information on the gifting process here; https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ

-DTN
Ah ok, thanks for the help Nami{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
